title: Deep Red Stamps Winter Night Rubber Cling Stamp 2.1 x 3.2 inches
features: Stamp Design Size: 2 x 2.9 inches. Deeply etched, natural red rubber attached to cling mounting foam.
Finely detailed designs. Use with any acrylic blocks (NOT included)
Excellent ink transfer on all surfaces. Safe to use with all crafting inks
Poly-coated package can be used as a cling stamp storage card
It all starts with a stamp! Deep Red Stamps Made in USA
description: Stamp Design Size: 2 x 2.9. Please note: This stamp does NOT include a block (wood or acrylic). Cling stamps are used with acrylic blocks, sold separately.
